structure.unit: ARTICLE XII. PUBLIC AND BUS PASSENGER BENCHES AND SHELTERS

text.section:
Sec. 21-162. Benches without advertising.
Each permittee shall agree to locate and maintain one (1) bench containing no advertising for every ten (10) approved benches that are placed that carry advertising. Such benches carrying no advertising shall be placed at locations designated by MDTA. No fee shall be charged for such benches, but permits will be required and an identification number shall be issued.
